recommended_degree: Psikologi Islam, Psikologi, Pendidikan Psikologi Konseling Buddha, Administrasi Bisnis, Ilmu Administrasi Bisnis (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_description:
Responsibilities
• Support the end-to-end recruitment process, including CV screening, interview scheduling, and conducting initial interviews when needed.
• Assist in onboarding processes, such as collecting documents, and coordinating with related departments.
• Maintain HR administrative tasks and document filing.
